mobile = '919813380623', txnType = 'POS', jwt_token = 'PjrGg43vFOYWRDJ1pvxaVtJW8cHw3spQCQLPHeevdXc='

    @staticmethod
    def doTransationMoreThanCardAvailableBalance(mobile, txnType, jwt_token):
        cardId = Card.getCardIdByMobileNumber(mobile, jwt_token)
        cardBalanceBeforeTxn = Card.fetch_total_balance_from_card(cardId, jwt_token)
        DemoTxnPostMethod.demo_txn_post_method(mobile, cardBalanceBeforeTxn + 1, txnType, jwt_token, cardId)
        txnHistory = CommonMethod.getTxnHistory(mobile, jwt_token)
        txnFailedReason = txnHistory[0].get("extraData").get("reason")
        txnStatus = txnHistory[0].get("txnStatus")
        cardBalanceAfterTxn = Card.fetch_total_balance_from_card(cardId, jwt_token)
>       assert txnFailedReason.lower() == PosEcomAndCLMinKyc.INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE.lower() and PosEcomAndCLMinKyc.FAILED.lower() == txnStatus and cardBalanceBeforeTxn == cardBalanceAfterTxn
